Sentencas: Forschungszentrum Julich is routinely operating solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) in stacks of planar design.
Titulo: Studies of material interaction after long-term stack operationx

Sentencas: Anode-supported cells are used in combination with ferritic steel interconnects as standard components.
Titulo: Studies of material interaction after long-term stack operationx

Sentencas: The stacks are typically sealed with glass-ceramics.
Titulo: Studies of material interaction after long-term stack operationx

Sentencas: In order to examine the long-term interaction between the materials comprising these components, and the contact and protection layers, SOFC stacks with operation times of more than 6,000 h at 800 degrees C have been disassembled and microstructurally examined.
Titulo: Studies of material interaction after long-term stack operationx

Sentencas: The stack disassembling and examination procedures are outlined and results from optical and scanning electron microscopy are presented.
Titulo: Studies of material interaction after long-term stack operationx

Sentencas: Two interaction observations that are considered to affect stack performance are addressed in detail.
Titulo: Studies of material interaction after long-term stack operationx

Sentencas: The effects refer to the reaction of the glass-ceramic sealant with the ferritic steel interconnect and to Cr deposition at the cathode/electrolyte interface.
Titulo: Studies of material interaction after long-term stack operationx

Sentencas: Measures and strategies to diminish and/or to prevent unwanted long-term material interactions are discussed.
Titulo: Studies of material interaction after long-term stack operationx
